comments.body: Can you move this this be more like https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/blob/master/test/e2e/pods.go ? You accidentally adopted a pattern like @filbranden's "transition" pattern, versus where we're trying to go to with the Gingko tests (@rrati starts on the pods suide, etc.). We need to figure out what suite this belongs in, but @roberthbailey in #3837 suggested a services suite so I'd honestly just start a "services.go" with this test being part of it
I'm working on a services suite now.  Just got the DNS test passing and hope to have the ROService tests soon.  I'll submit that change soon so this can land in that suite.
